full_summary:
**EZ897-250196: Phase 1 Soil Treatment Facility Remediation** 
=====================================

**Tender Details**
---------------

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4643920616
*   **Reference Number:** WS4643954775
*   **Publication Date:** June 20, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** July 12, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** June 20, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 12, 2024

**Tender Description**
---------------------

This tender invitation is for Phase 1 of a two-phase competition to bid on the operation and maintenance of soil treatment facilities (STF). The scope of work includes relocating compliant soil to onsite stockpiles and disposing of contaminated soil and water.

**Selection Criteria and Evaluation**
--------------------------------------

Bidders will be evaluated based on their qualifications in Phase 1. Only qualified bidders will be invited to submit a financial bid in Phase 2, following submission of specifications and drawings.

**Contractor Information**
-------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Notice Information**
---------------------

The notice URL can be found at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20081566?extsite=MjAwODE1NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information**
--------------------

*   **Contact Name:** Janie Leung (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email:** janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery**
-----------------------------------------

*   **Region of Opportunity:** None
*   **Region of Delivery:** Canada, British Columbia

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

This tender invitation is being advertised via a competitive open bidding process. The selection criteria is the lowest price.

**Notice Type**
----------------

This is an invitation to qualify. You are invited to submit your qualifications for this tender invitation. Bidders will be evaluated based on their qualifications in Phase 1, and only the qualified bidders will be invited to submit a financial bid in Phase
